members.member: Need to provide async request options http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/86wf6409(VS.71).aspx

member.name: P:ServiceStack.ServiceClient.Web.AsyncServiceClient.HttpWebRequestFilter
member.summary: The request filter is called before any request. This request filter is executed globally.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.ServiceClient.Web.AsyncServiceClient.HttpWebResponseFilter
member.summary: The response action is called once the server response is available. It will allow you to access raw response information. This response action is executed globally. Note that you should NOT consume the response stream as this is handled by ServiceStack

member.name: P:ServiceStack.ServiceClient.Web.AsyncServiceClient.OnAuthenticationRequired
member.summary: Called before request resend, when the initial request required authentication

member.name: P:ServiceStack.ServiceClient.Web.AsyncServiceClient.LocalHttpWebRequestFilter
member.summary: The request filter is called before any request. This request filter only works with the instance where it was set (not global).

member.name: P:ServiceStack.ServiceClient.Web.AsyncServiceClient.LocalHttpWebResponseFilter
member.summary: The response action is called once the server response is available. It will allow you to access raw response information. Note that you should NOT consume the response stream as this is handled by ServiceStack

members.member: Need to provide async request options http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/86wf6409(VS.71).aspx

member.name: T:ServiceStack.Common.Support.InMemoryLogFactory
member.summary:
Note: InMemoryLog keeps all logs in memory, so don't use it long running exceptions
Returns a thread-safe InMemoryLog which you can use while *TESTING* to provide a detailed analysis of your logs.

member.name: T:ServiceStack.Common.UrnId
member.summary:
Creates a Unified Resource Name (URN) with the following formats:
- urn:{TypeName}:{IdFieldValue} e.g. urn:UserSession:1 - urn:{TypeName}:{IdFieldName}:{IdFieldValue} e.g. urn:UserSession:UserId:1

member.summary: Provide the an option for the callee to block until all commands are executed

member.name: M:ServiceStack.Common.Utils.FuncUtils.TryExec(System.Action)
member.summary: Invokes the action provided and returns true if no excpetion was thrown. Otherwise logs the exception and returns false if an exception was thrown.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.Common.Utils.PathUtils.MapProjectPath(System.String)
member.summary: Maps the path of a file in the context of a VS project
member.remarks: Assumes static content is two directories above the /bin/ directory, eg. in a unit test scenario the assembly would be in /bin/Debug/.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.Common.Utils.PathUtils.MapAbsolutePath(System.String)
member.summary: Maps the path of a file in a self-hosted scenario
member.remarks: Assumes static content is copied to /bin/ folder with the assemblies

member.name: M:ServiceStack.Common.Utils.PathUtils.MapHostAbsolutePath(System.String)
member.summary: Maps the path of a file in an Asp.Net hosted scenario
member.remarks: Assumes static content is in the parent folder of the /bin/ directory

member.summary:
Creates the error response from the values provided.
If the errorCode is empty it will use the first validation error code, if there is none it will throw an error.
